metadata.title: Genome Sequence of the Novel Reassortant Mammalian Orthoreovirus Strain MRV00304/13, Isolated from a Calf with Diarrhea from the United States

abstract.original_text: Mammalian orthoreovirus (MRV) strain MRV00304/13 was isolated from diarrheic calves. The serotype-specific antigen 1 was found to be 95% identical to that of bovine MRV1. All predicted viral proteins had >92% identity to those of MRV except 2 and 1s (80 and 72% identities, respectively), suggesting that MRV00304/13 is a novel reassortant MRV1.

sentences.segment_text: Mammalian orthoreovirus ( MRV ) strain MRV00304/13 was isolated from diarrheic calves .
The serotype-specific antigen 1 was found to be 95 % identical to that of bovine MRV1 .
All predicted viral proteins had > 92 % identity to those of MRV except 2 and 1s ( 80 and 72 % identities , respectively ) ,
suggesting that MRV00304/13 is a novel reassortant MRV1 .
